text: 1:6 2 Timoti 2:24-261:6-9 1 Timoti 3:2-7Siosɨn gumazamizir dapaniba, me gumazamizir igharazibar damazibar deraghvɨra ikɨ. Siosɨn gumazir dapanim amuir vamɨra ikɨ, egh poroghamir arazim abɨghan markɨ. Eghtɨ men boriba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn ikɨva, gumazamizibar damazibar arazir kurabar amuan markɨ. Egh uan afeziaba ko amebabar akaba munasan kogham.
